attributes.review:
this app...HORRIBLE!!!. the UI did not function AT ALL!!! and it didn't look good either!! 

first the app took TWO MONTHS to download!! then it wanted to steal my personal information (stalker much?). my poor dog started howling in pain after i opened the app (dw, he's quite alright now, after i deleted this disgusting app.) 

to add on, my globe started to look like a bad rendition of the american flag after this app was downloaded. thankfully, i uninstalled this horrendous app before it was too late and my globe looked like earth in american movies. bad, and only focusing on america. 

i DO NOT recommend this app to anyone, including my worst enemy. no one deserves to waste their data on this app!! unless you want your dog to howl in pain and watch your globe turn into a horrible country only, DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!
attributes.title: MY GOD

attributes.review: Ok first of all as soon as I opened the app to see what trump was going to do for the presidential election, immediately my phone started crashing my apps would NOT open up and I felt like someone was controlling my phone. And I am very confused as to why that was happening, I with thinking maybe it had a virus, but then I am not lying about this I got an actual warning stating one of my apps where detected with a virus. This app I do not recommend!!!
attributes.title: I would never ever recommend this app.
